2: Our COO just honeymooned in Kaua’i and she couldn’t stop raving about the coffee! One of our favorite things to do when traveling is to try both the local roasters blend and the island favorite @kauaicoffeeco - let us tell you they were all pretty spectacular.
3: Morning after St. Patrick’s Day feelings...
4: It may be snowing in March where we are, but summer is coming. Guess it’s time for us to share that we’re working on our own cold brew to share the shelves with our K-Cups and filters!
5: Right ladies?! And also guys whose hair is long enough ☺️
6: Monday has us feeling a sort of WAY.
7: This photo may be confusing at first, but there’s a story behind it. Last week we got a shipment in of 550 lbs of coffee and 10,000 of our freshly made K-Cups. The delivery driver couldn’t back up to our loading dock, due to construction, so one of our team members moved all of those boxes 500 feet from the FedEx truck to our dock to be prepared for shipment. Some days we post cute quotes and coffee photos, and other days we want to show you what our team does behind the scenes to make it all work. Get after it today!
9: We love our coffee quotes, but during snow storms we just want our coffee!!!
10: Best thing about coffee - you can add tons of cream and sugar or none at all!
11:
Tired of your morning coffee routine? Try changing it up with a smoothie! Until we have perfected our own cold brew, our go to is Stok!

1 - 1/2 cups of ice
1/4 cup skim milk
1 - 1/2cups Stok Cold Brew
1 tbsp peanut butter
Dash of honey
1 banana
1 scoop protein powder
